pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.3: akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.4: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.5: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.7: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.3: Pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.4: atirekamāsakaṃ vā ūnapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.5: māsakaṃ vā ūnamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.6: adinnaṃ ādiyanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #2
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.1: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.2: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.3: Manussaṃ odissa opātaṃ khaṇati “papatitvā marissatī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.4: papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.6: sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #3
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.1: Asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.2: Asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.3: pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.4: “yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā”ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.6: asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #4
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.4: ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.6: upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.3: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.4: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.8: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #2
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.1: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.2: vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.3: vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.4: kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #3
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.1: Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.2: mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.3: paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.4: tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #4
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.3: paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.4: paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #5
pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.1: Saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:12.1: Mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.1: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.2: anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.3: okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa. #8
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.1: Bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.2: anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.3: okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa. #9
pli-tv-pvr1.10:15.1: Saṃghabhedako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:16.1: Bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:17.1: Dubbaco bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:18.1: Kuladūsako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.4: anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. #14
